description: Wide variety of advanced innovation concepts explored as part of Nike R&D team
Technical design support of Hydro Flask’s expansion into the premium soft cooler category
Creating beautiful stainless steel bottles to help Bivo disrupt the plastic bike bottle industry
Next-gen snow boot design for Columbia, offering waterproof warmth and enhanced ice traction
Nixon watch design exploration focused on modern beauty and unique user interface
Premium accessory for Nike Considered product line, made with 100% natural materials
Years of contribution to Giro’s award-winning line of road, trail, and urban cycling shoes
Hydration hip pack emphasizing convenient access and comfort for mountain bikers and hikers
Nike customization concept offering individual performance choice within a uniform team look
Design exploration and modeling for Infocus desktop video-conferencing equipment
Cozy, cute women’s sheepskin slipper concepts for Australian footwear brand Emu
Zenimal’s meditation turtle is a tactile audio device encouraging mindfulness in children
Waterproof, welded roll-top Giro backpack designed for all-season bike commuting
CAD development & fit test prototyping for modern bra style offering supportive, strapless comfort
Innovative origami-inspired luggage line offering an organized, accessible travel experience
Kuru footwear promises an orthopedic level of underfoot support in casual, stylish silhouettes
Nazent’s gaiter has a tailored fit for comfortable breathing and anti-fog protection in extreme conditions
Design + engineering collaboration to achieve Pashion’s unique goal of creating a convertible high-heel
Insulated and easy to clean lunch box, a logical extension to HydroFlask’s product line
Giro urban cycling collection builds performance functionality into streetwear silhouettes
User research program led to a unique all-in-one portable multimedia product for HP
Performance soccer innovation for Nike - lighter weight, enhanced fit, customizable traction…
Development of waterproof soft good accessories for Burley’s versatile bike-trailer system
Standing-height, mobile collaboration table produced as part of family of open-office solutions for Herman Miller
Futuristic glove project leveraging footwear materials and construction methods for UA
Men’s sport watch concepts integrating health-tracking and HR tech for wearables brand Mio
Conceptual program for Oakley’s swimwear division resulted in innovative, iconic sandal designs
Study of mobile work scenarios and patterns to identify new accessory opportunities for Steelcase
Targeted, comfortable and user-friendly heat therapy wrap concept for sport / medical startup
Iconic ‘Taco’ backpack designed for Nike Presto product line, featured in Surface magazine
Concept exploration for Humanscale searching for unique task seating design approaches
Snow goggle concepts for Nike eyewear attempting to identify more as outerwear than equipment
Giro’s innovation-awardedTechLace fit system combined the best aspects of lace and dial performance
Fun sketch exploration of interactive vehicles for re-launch of Weebles toy line by Hasbro
Performance fit, comfort, and ventilation designed into Hydro Flask’s cold-water hydration backpack
Concepts rendered to identify new tech-integrated fitness opportunities for New Balance
Advanced performance basketball footwear concepts created for the Jordan brand
New forms, material directions, and ergonomic benefits visualized for HP laptop project
Advanced concepts for Adidas exploring how runners might carry and interact with technology on the fly
Design language & production specs for family of Converse ‘heritage canvas’ accessories
S-Hook by Astro, an extruded aluminum fixture for hanging skate decks as art or for everyday use
Hybrid bike frame design studies and small-item storage solutions for Bomdiggity brand
Adaptive outerwear system concept for Nike ACG with distributed load carry and articulating zip-seams
Retro canvas performance basketball sneaker inspired by legendary coach John Wooden
Equestrian lifestyle brand Oughton’s premium bag line, made in Argentina from rich leather & coated canvas.
Thank you for reviewing these project examples. Please feel free to contact me to discuss the possibility of working together.
